messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Just Say No to Drugs
messages.msgSnippet: ... I noticed the same thing.  I also wondered what he meant by the hypnosis box.  Was that referring to television or to something else? Patti [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
Annette Naake wrote:

> I'm sure Marc meant well by taking his nephews hiking and leaving
> their
> medication home. But I'm not sure I cared for the authoritarian tone
> of "we
> marched their little butts all over creation, and they HAD to keep
> up."

I noticed the same thing. I also wondered what he meant by the
"hypnosis box." Was that referring to television or to something else?

Patti



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: Just Say No to Drugs
messages.msgSnippet: I m sure Marc meant well by taking his nephews hiking and leaving their medication home. But I m not sure I cared for the authoritarian tone of we marched
messages.messageBody:
I'm sure Marc meant well by taking his nephews hiking and leaving their
medication home. But I'm not sure I cared for the authoritarian tone of "we
marched their little butts all over creation, and they HAD to keep up." It
sounded a little disrespectful. Just my 2 cents.

Annette
